palette.title: Hurts Miles Inside
palette.description:
(To a tiny Don Quixote, hana ,who is tilting at giant windmill right now.Keep fighting jedi knight.You can beat the bastard off.) I wrote this for you,hana yesterday and now is just too late to make you see it...RIP darling there under the apple tree... “Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won't either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up. And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could.” ― Louise Erdrich, The Painted Drum LP Rest in peace, Hana August 15, 1974 - October 12, 2012 Soul screaming too loud Licking wounds knee-deep in doubt Keep breathing...In...Out...

Haiku

Palettes

& Poetic
